message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering our product! We're excited to offer it to you at a price of $12000. We believe this is a great value considering the product's features and benefits.
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  $12000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $10500.  This is a fair price considering the product's value to me and your desired selling point.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, we're willing to meet you halfway and offer the product at $11000. We believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you and our original asking price.
